text: tavada apage vadan visvasa karana aya numba veta pæmini vita numbalata salam (santiya) yæyi numba (ovunata) pavasanu. numbalage paramadhipati taman kerehi karuna va niyama kara gatteya. niyata vasayenma numbala aturin kavarek nodænuvatkamin yam napurak kota in pasuva pasutævili vi hæda gæsuneda evita sæbævinma ohu (allah) ati ksamasiliya. maha karuna gunayen yuktaya
